info.name: 39QR Review & Coupon SaaS API - With Campaigns
info.description: Complete API collection including wallet system, automated campaigns (inactive recall, festival broadcasts, scheduled campaigns)

request.description: Create a new admin/agent. Optionally specify subscription_type ('annual' or 'monthly') and subscription_expires_at date.

query.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) - Optional, defaults to 3 months ago
End date (YYYY-MM-DD) - Optional, defaults to today

request.description:
Get comprehensive admin dashboard analytics including:
- Platform overview (merchants by type/status)
- Merchant statistics (recent, top performers)
- Revenue tracking (annual fees, credit sales, commissions)
- Wallet statistics
- Coupon performance platform-wide
- WhatsApp usage and costs
- Customer engagement metrics
- Platform growth timeline

Default: Last 3 months
Create a new staff member. Roles: finance_viewer, ad_approver, support_staff

query.description: Filter by role: finance_viewer, ad_approver, support_staff

request.description: Get all staff members with optional filters
Get a specific staff member by ID
Update staff member details
Delete (soft delete) a staff member

body.raw:
{
  "admin_id": 1,
  "name": "John's Restaurant23",
  "email": "restaurantannual@example.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "role": "merchant",
  "business_name": "John's Fine Dining",
  "business_type": "Restaurant",
  "merchant_type": "annual",
  "address": "123 Main St", 
  "city": "Kuala Lumpur",
  "country": "Malaysia",
  "map_link": "https://maps.google.com/?q=3.139,101.687",
  "latitude": 3.139003,
  "longitude": 101.686855,
  "tax_id": "TX123456",
  "is_active":true
}

request.description:
Get comprehensive merchant dashboard analytics including:
- Coupon statistics (issued, redeemed, expired, redemption rate)
- Coupon breakdown by batch
- Feedback/review statistics by platform (Google, Facebook, Instagram, XiaoHongShu)
- Lucky draw participation and prize distribution
- Customer statistics (total, new, returning, top 10 customers)
- WhatsApp message tracking and cost estimation
- Daily timeline trends for all metrics

Default: Last 30 days
Get admin wallet details including balance, total earnings, and total spent
Get paginated list of admin wallet transactions
Get merchant wallet details including credits, subscription type, and expiry
Get paginated list of merchant wallet transactions

Add credits to merchant wallet from a credit package. REQUIRED: package_id must be provided and package must exist. System verifies package compatibility with merchant type (temporary merchants cannot purchase WhatsApp BI packages). Automatically credits admin with commission.
Upgrade merchant from temporary to annual subscription. Credits admin wallet with 75% commission (RM900)
Get super admin wallet details including balance and total earnings (Super Admin only)
Process admin annual subscription payment. Credits super admin wallet and extends admin subscription by 1 year.

query.description: Filter by merchant type: temporary or annual

request.description: Get all available credit packages. Managed by super admin only.
Get credit packages for annual merchants only
Get credit packages for temporary merchants only
Get a specific credit package by ID

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Starter Package",
  "description": "Perfect for small businesses",
  "credits": 100,
  "credit_type": "whatsapp bi message",
  "price": 50.00,
  "price_per_credit": 0.50,
  "currency": "USD",
  "merchant_type": "annual",
  "is_active": true,
  "sort_order": 1,
  "bonus_credits": 0
}

request.description: Create a new credit package (Super Admin only). No longer requires admin_id.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Updated Starter Package",
  "description": "Updated description for small businesses",
  "credits": 150,
  "price": 60.00,
  "price_per_credit": 0.40,
  "is_active": true,
  "bonus_credits": 15
}

request.description: Update an existing credit package (Super Admin only). No longer requires admin_id.
Delete a credit package (Super Admin only). Performs soft delete. No longer requires admin_id.
Get all super admin settings including commission rates, fees, and currency (Super Admin only)

Update super admin settings. All fields are optional. Rates are decimal values (e.g., 0.20 = 20%, 0.02 = 2%). Fields:
- admin_annual_subscription_fee: Admin annual subscription fee
- temporary_merchant_packages_admin_commission_rate: Commission for temporary merchant packages
- annual_merchant_packages_admin_commission_rate: Commission for annual merchant packages
- merchant_annual_fee: Merchant annual subscription fee
- annual_merchant_subscription_admin_commission_rate: Admin commission for merchant annual subscriptions
Get the current admin subscription fee. No authentication required. Returns fee amount and currency.

Get all commission rates and fees. No authentication required. Returns:
- temporaryMerchantCommissionRate (default: 0.20 = 20%)
- annualMerchantCommissionRate (default: 0.02 = 2%)
- merchantAnnualFee (default: 1199.00)
- adminAnnualCommissionRate (default: 0.75 = 75%)
- currency

body.raw:
{
  "merchant_id": {{merchant_id}},
  "batch_name": "Winter Sale 2029",
  "batch_type": "temporary",
  "total_quantity": 3,
  "start_date": "2026-01-01",
  "end_date": "2026-02-05",
  "is_active": true,
//   "whatsapp_enabled": false,
//   "lucky_draw_enabled": false,
  "template_id": 2,
  "header": "Special Offer",
  "title": "50% Off",
  "description": "Use this coupon to get 50% off your next purchase.",
  "ishalal": true

}

request.description: Get a specific coupon batch by ID.
Update a coupon batch. All fields are optional.
Soft delete a coupon batch (sets deleted_at timestamp).

query.description: Filter by category: auth, merchant, admin, customer, coupon, whatsapp, wallet, campaign, payment, system
Filter by action: login, logout, register, create, update, delete, redeem, etc.
Filter by level: info, warning, error, critical
Filter by user ID
Filter by user type: super_admin, admin, merchant, customer
Filter by entity type: merchant, coupon, campaign, etc.
Filter by entity ID
Filter from date (ISO 8601)
Filter to date (ISO 8601)

request.description: Get all system logs with optional filtering. Super admins can see all logs, admins can only see their own operations.
Get a single system log by ID
Get all authentication logs (login, logout, register)
Get all merchant operation logs
Get all agent (admin) operation logs
Get all coupon operation logs (create, issue, redeem, batch_create, expire)
Get all WhatsApp message logs (sent/failed)
Get WhatsApp UI message logs (user-initiated: feedback, lucky draw, homepage)
Get WhatsApp BI message logs (business-initiated: birthday, inactive recall, festival campaigns)
Get all wallet transaction logs (credit_add, credit_deduct, topup, refund)
Get all automated campaign logs (birthday, inactive customer)
Get all customer activity logs (feedback submissions, etc.)
Get logs within a specific date range
Get all critical error logs
Get all logs related to a specific merchant
Find a coupon by its unique code.
Get a specific coupon by ID.
Update a coupon. Typically used to change status or assign to a customer.
Update a coupon. Typically used to change status or assign to a customer.
Soft delete a coupon (sets deleted_at timestamp).

body.raw:
{
  "merchant_id": {{merchant_id}},
  "batch_id": {{batch_id}},
  "prize_name": "70% Off Coupon",
  "prize_description": "Get 50% off your next purchase",
  "prize_type": "coupon",
  "probability": 25.00,
  "daily_limit": 10,
  "total_limit": 100,
  "is_active": true,
  "sort_order": 1
}

request.description: Create a new lucky draw prize. Probability must not exceed 100% total across all prizes for the batch.
Update an existing prize configuration.
Get all prizes configured for a merchant.

item.name: Get Prizes by Merchant and Batch

request.description: Get prizes for a specific batch.
Soft delete a prize.
Spin the lucky draw wheel and receive a random prize based on configured probabilities.
Get all lucky draw spin results for a specific customer.
Filter customer results by merchant.
Mark a prize as claimed by the customer.
Reset daily prize count for all prizes (typically called by cron job at midnight).
Retrieve all system default preset reviews (10 default sentences)

query.description: Merchant ID

request.description: Get all preset reviews available for a specific merchant (system defaults + merchant custom)
Get a specific preset review by ID
Update a merchant's custom preset review (cannot edit system defaults)
Create feedback using a preset review. Customer selects from available preset sentences.

body.raw:
{
  "merchantId": 1,
  "email": "jane.smith@example.com",
  "password": "password456",
  "name": "Jane Smith",
  "phoneNumber": "+1234567891",
  "date_of_birth": "20-08-1992",
  "address": "456 Oak Ave",
  "gender": "female",
  "rating": 5,
  "comment": "Loved everything!",
  "reviewType": "custom",
  "customReviewText": "Amazing food and great atmosphere! The staff was incredibly friendly and the service was quick. Will definitely come back again!",
  "selectedPlatform": "facebook",
  "redirectCompleted": false,
  "coupon_batch_id": 1
}

request.description: Create feedback with a custom review text written by the customer.
Mark that the customer successfully completed the redirect to the review platform

Get comprehensive review analytics for a merchant including:
- Total reviews
- Preset vs custom breakdown
- Platform statistics
- Redirect completion rate
Get all feedbacks with pagination and optional filters
Get a specific feedback by ID with all relations
Update an existing feedback
Soft delete a feedback

body.raw:
{
  "merchantId": {{merchant_id}},
  "enablePresetReviews": false,
  "enableGoogleReviews": true,
  "enableFacebookReviews": false,
  "enableInstagramReviews": false,
  "enableXiaohongshuReviews": false,
  "googleReviewUrl": "https://g.page/r/CdWC9gKqRRFdEBM/review",
  "facebookPageUrl": "https://facebook.com/yourpage",
  "instagramUrl": "https://instagram.com/yourprofile",
  "xiaohongshuUrl": "https://xiaohongshu.com/yourprofile",
  "birthday_message_enabled": true,
  "days_before_birthday": 3,
  "days_after_birthday": 0,
  "birthday_coupon_batch_id": 1
}

request.description: Create settings for a merchant. Usually done automatically when merchant is created.
Get settings for a specific merchant. Public endpoint - no auth required.
Update merchant settings. All fields are optional - only send fields you want to update.
Soft delete merchant settings.
Send OTP verification code via WhatsApp
Send welcome message to new user
Send coupon notification with QR code
Send custom text message
Send feedback reminder to customer
Send prize won notification for lucky draw
Send document (PDF, invoice, etc.) via WhatsApp
Health check endpoint for WhatsApp service

query.description: Start date for filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)
End date for filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)

request.description:
Get comprehensive platform analytics for super admin including:
- Admin stats (total, active, inactive)
- Merchant stats (total, active, inactive, annual, temporary)
- Customer stats
- Feedback submissions
- Coupon stats (issued, redeemed, expired, active)
- Revenue totals (commission, annual fees, credit purchases)
- Monthly revenue breakdown
- Merchant and customer growth
- Top 10 merchants by coupons redeemed

All metrics support date filtering via startDate and endDate query parameters.

query.description: Start date for filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)
End date for filtering (YYYY-MM-DD)

request.description:
Get comprehensive platform analytics for super admin including:
- Admin stats (total, active, inactive)
- Merchant stats (total, active, inactive, annual, temporary)
- Customer stats
- Feedback submissions
- Coupon stats (issued, redeemed, expired, active)
- Revenue totals (commission, annual fees, credit purchases)
- Monthly revenue breakdown
- Merchant and customer growth
- Top 10 merchants by coupons redeemed

All metrics support date filtering via startDate and endDate query parameters.

Create a new scheduled campaign. Only available for annual merchants.

Placeholders in message:
- {customer_name} - Replaced with customer's name
- {business_name} - Replaced with merchant's business name

Target audiences:
- all: All customers
- active: Feedback in last 30 days
- inactive: No feedback in last 90 days
- first_time: Only 1 feedback
- returning: More than 1 feedback

query.description: Filter by merchant ID
Filter by status: scheduled, processing, completed, cancelled, failed

request.description: Get all scheduled campaigns. Merchants can only see their own campaigns. Super admins can see all campaigns.
Get details of a specific campaign including merchant and coupon batch information.
Update a scheduled campaign. Only campaigns with status 'scheduled' can be updated. All fields are optional.
Cancel a scheduled campaign. Only campaigns with status 'scheduled' can be cancelled. Sets status to 'cancelled'.
Get all campaigns without filters. Merchants see only their campaigns, super admins see all.
Get all completed campaigns with statistics (total customers, messages sent, messages failed).
